predict: Non-standard pronunciation is identified by prepending each grapheme sequence with an artificial token consisting of the language's ISO 639-3 code enclosed in angle brackets. This approach addresses the issue of different languages having distinct pronunciation patterns and ensures that low-resource languages can still benefit from high resource data for pronunciation modeling.
